Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndipo Mfumu idati, “Ndithudi ine ndalota ndili kuona ng’ombe zisanu ndi ziwiri zonenepa, zimene zinali kudyedwa ndi ng’ombe zisanu ndi ziwiri zoonda ndiponso ngala zina zisanu ndi ziwiri zaziwisi ndi ngala zisanu ndi ziwiri zouma. Oh inu nduna zanga! Ndiuzeni tanthauzo la maloto anga, ngati inu mungathe kutanthauzira maloto.”
Iwo adati, “Awa ndi maloto opanda ntchito ndipo ife sititha kutanthauzira maloto.”
Ndipo munthu amene adatulutsidwa m’ndende, adakumbukira patapita nthawi yaitali ndipo adati, “Ine ndikuuzani kutanthauzira kwake koma nditumizeni kuti ndipite.”

“Oh Yosefe munthu wa choonadi! Tiuzeni za ng’ombe zisanu ndi ziwiri zonenepa zimene zinali kudyedwa ndi ng’ombe zisanu ndi ziwiri zoonda ndiponso za ngala zisanu ndi ziwiri zaziwisi ndi ngala zisanu ndi ziwiri zouma, kuti ndibwerere ndikawauze anthu kuti akadziwe tanthauzo lake?”
Yosefe adati, “Inu mudzabzala zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri monga momwe mumachitira ndipo zimene muzikolola muzizisiya mumakoko ake kupatula pang’ono zomwe muzidya.”
“Ndipo potha izi kudzadza zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri za chilala pamene mudzadya zimene mudasunga kupatula pang’ono zimene mudzasunge.”
“Ndipo pambuyo pa izi kudzabwera chaka chimene anthu adzalandira mvula yambiri, ndipo m’chaka chimenecho azidzafinya zipatso.”
